des: "A rich, delicious gluten-free and grain-free pudding spiced with cinnamon, cardamom, and vanilla. Excellent with fresh or frozen (thawed) fruit."
ins: Mix milk, almond meal, sugar, cinnamon, espresso powder, and cardamom in a large saucepan; bring to a simmer. Cook, stirring often, over low heat until slightly thickened, 20 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract. Chill in refrigerator until thickened, at least 3 hours.
